import React from 'react' import { Card, Col, Image, ListGroup, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useCalcGlobalContext } from '../../context/ContextCalculator' const MirrorCalculator = () => { const { state: ingrediente } = useCalcGlobalContext() return (

TOTALS

{ Object .keys(ingrediente) .map((name, index) => { return ( {`${name}:`} { name === "Hidration" ? ` ${ingrediente[name]} %` : ` ${ingrediente[name]} g` } ) }) } ) } export default MirrorCalculator
